# How I made this

I used the RMD HTML doument format, more information here: https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/html-document.html



## Clone Git Repo

I first created a project in GitHub, then from a terminal, executed;

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
cd git # navigate to my git folder
git clone (URL) # clone this project
```

I then changed the connection to an SSH instead of HTTPS, using the steps in my Data Science Handbook.
